description: The self-proclaimed "old friend" of Itoshiki Nozomu, who, like Nozomu, likes old things. It is later found out that they weren`t old friends (旧友) but rather "one day friends" (1日友) in elementary school. His name is a reference to the anime series Ikkyuu-san. He attempted to marry Rin, thus gaining an "old name" and becoming a member of an "old family", but Kafuka thwarted him in his advances.
name: Ikkyuu
